title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 11 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 11 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Todd Herman fills in for Rush on Veterans Day and honors our heroes. We are experts at pattern recognition and must apply it to this election to build a legal case. The rush of the media to anoint Biden is dangerous because now you’ll be taking something away if the results are reversed. Biden is proving the Logan Act is nonsense. Callers weigh in with frustration and suggestions.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Big Tech is corrupt and blatantly bias. Rand Paul gets censored by Twitter for asking about the 1.1 million stimulus checks sent to dead people and the possibility they got ballots too. Todd replays 24-year-old caller from yesterday with a powerful message. State senator of Michigan, Aric Nesbitt, discusses voter fraud. Trump’s gift to us. We have to be able to trust our institutions. The importance of thanking our veterans.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


The greatest act of disinformation and misinformation is taking place before our eyes. Todd’s personal stories about veterans. Wolf Blitzer tweets no fraud, despite more incoming evidence to the contrary. The New York Times is not a newspaper anymore. Whistleblowers are afraid to come forward. Caller asks about vote-tampering penalties. Trump has invested everything in this country -- and here’s what you can do to help.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
